Plot: The story of Venezuelan revolutionary Ilich Ramírez Sánchez, who founded a worldwide terrorist organization and raided the 1975 OPEC meeting.
Title: Carlos
Actors: Edgar Ramirez, Alexander Scheer, Fadi Abi Samra, Lamia Ahmed
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 15 wins & 34 nominations.
Language: English, Arabic, German, Spanish, French, Hungarian, Japanese, Russian
